programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Mother Goose - Fun With Reading

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Got Served

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hook, Line & Printer
